Entities.Name: Clinical Concepts
Entities.Definition: Key medical and healthcare entities identified from unstructured physician's notes such as symptoms, diagnoses, treatments, and tests.

Sample Data.Sentence: The patient was diagnosed with diabetes and prescribed Metformin.

Entities.Name: Semantic Categories
Entities.Definition: Categories based on the ontology that include entities like symptoms, procedures, and medications which are derived from the clinical notes.

Sample Data.Sentence: Patient shows signs of severe asthma, needs to continue using inhaler.

Dataset.Name: Clinical Free-Text Notes
Dataset.Details: A collection of unstructured clinical notes from physicians, used to train and evaluate the OB-CIE system for extracting structured clinical information.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: The system uses an ontology-based approach to extract clinical concepts by matching noun phrases to their semantic categories using a predefined dictionary of ontology concepts.
Annotation Guidelines.Supplement Link: Details or link to the supplemental materials were not mentioned explicitly in the document.
